short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a current FPS(frames per second) on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is extension for debugging website perfomance. It's just easier to turn on than the developer tools one. inspired by similar extension which is no longer available in Chrome Store.
